name: mosey
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to walk or go slowly, usually without a special purpose: I'll just mosey on down to the beach for a while. Synonym
amble

Add to word list
to walk or go slowly, usually without a special purpose: I think I’ll mosey on down to the beach for a while.
